name: International Congress on Immunology
content: Dear Colleagues, We are delighted to announce and honored to invite you to the International Congress on Immunology (EUROIMMUNOLOGY2024) on September 26-28- 2024 in Nice, France. The EUROIMMUNOLOGY2024 aim is to become the most prestigious forum for the exchange of new ideas, technologies, and novel findings in a broad spectrum of scales ranging from the as well as in basic research and applications. The primary goal of the conference is to promote research and developmental activities in Immunology and provide opportunities for the delegates to exchange new ideas and application experience face to face, to establish business or research relations and to find global partners for future collaboration. The leading researchers, scholars and experts of the fields will be brought together to attend the international conference. We warmly welcome the prospective authors who are interested in the sessions to submit abstract to EUROIMMUNOLOGY2024 to join in the conference. We are looking forward to seeing you in Nice, France!
